text: Michael or Mihalis Giannatos (1941 - 17 September 2013), alternatively spelled as Yannatos (), was a Greek actÎ¿r. Giannatos was born in Istanbul, Turkey in 1941. He left the city for Greece in 1964 during the long eviction period of Greeks. He was married to Chaido Giannatos. Giannatos died on 17 September 2013 from a heart attack in his Athens, Greece home, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== *Actor entry at IMDB *Actor entry at ishow.gr (mostly in Greek but also some in English) Category:1941 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in Greece Category:Greek actors Category:Television actors Category:Stage actors Category:Movie actors
title: Michael Giannatos
